description: Team skills manifest for the Skills Package Manager. Defines required, recommended, internal, and blocked skills with policy settings.

local:./skills/dbt-template.description: DBT (Data Build Tool) project templates and best practices for analytics engineering

local:./skills/github-actions.description: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline patterns for reusable workflows, OIDC cloud auth, and secure pipeline design

local:./skills/helm-charts.description: Helm chart library, wrapper chart, template helper, and packaging patterns for Kubernetes deployments

local:./skills/crossplane.description: Crossplane Composition and XRD patterns for cloud-agnostic infrastructure as code from Kubernetes

local:./skills/external-secrets.description: External Secrets Operator patterns for syncing AWS, GCP, or Vault secrets into Kubernetes

local:./skills/gke-workload-identity.description: GKE Workload Identity patterns for keyless GCP authentication from Kubernetes pods without service account keys

github:vercel-labs/agent-skills/react-be.description: React and Next.js performance optimization guidelines from Vercel Engineering. Contains 40+ rules across 8 categories prioritized by impact. Use when writing React components, optimizing performance, or reviewing code for best practices.

github:vercel-labs/agent-skills/web-desi.description: Review UI code for compliance with web interface best practices. Audits your code for 100+ rules covering accessibility, performance, and UX. Use when reviewing UI, checking accessibility, or auditing design.

muratcankoylan/context-engineering-funda.description: Understand context, context windows, and anatomy of context in agent systems. Foundation for effective AI agent interactions.

muratcankoylan/context-degradation.description: Recognize patterns of context failure: lost-in-middle, poisoning, distraction, and clash. Debug agent context issues.

muratcankoylan/evaluation.description: Build evaluation frameworks for agent systems. Test and measure AI agent performance.

muratcankoylan/advanced-evaluation.description: LLM-as-a-Judge techniques: direct scoring, pairwise comparison, rubric generation, and bias mitigation.

local:./skills/dbt-template.description: DBT (Data Build Tool) project templates and best practices for analytics engineering

local:./skills/github-actions.description: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline patterns for reusable workflows, OIDC cloud auth, and secure pipeline design

registry.description: Additional skills available for manual installation. These are not auto-installed but can be discovered and installed on-demand.

github:vercel-labs/agent-skills/composit.description: React composition patterns that scale. Helps avoid boolean prop proliferation through compound components, state lifting, and internal composition. Use when refactoring components or building reusable libraries.

github:vercel-labs/agent-skills/react-na.description: React Native best practices optimized for AI agents. Contains 16 rules across 7 sections covering performance, architecture, and platform-specific patterns. Use when building React Native or Expo apps.

github:vercel-labs/agent-skills/vercel-d.description: Deploy applications and websites to Vercel instantly. Designed for use with claude.ai and Claude Desktop to enable deployments directly from conversations. Deployments are 'claimable' - users can transfer ownership to their own Vercel account.
